definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: Our company is located in songjiang district of Shanghai beautiful satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位于上海美丽的卫星城松江。

sentences.english: Many visitors wil choose to stay in the suburbs, satellite towns and neighboring cities.
sentences.chinese: 许多参观者会选择住在郊区，卫星城，和临近城市。

sentences.english: The solution of this problem is to establish industrial satellite towns in the outer-suburb.
sentences.chinese: 解决的办法是在远郊区建设工业卫星城镇。

sentences.english: Our company is located in the beautiful Shanghai Songjiang satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位于上海美丽的卫星城松江。

sentences.english: Privet Drive is on the outskirts of what I would call a " satellite" town to London.
sentences.chinese: 女贞路是在我把它称之为伦敦的“卫星城”的边缘。

sentences.english: The satellite cities and the 33 major towns will also be afforested.
sentences.chinese: 完善郊区卫星城和33个中心镇绿化体系。

definition: Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
